description: Ek Nath Dhakal (born 13 August 1974) is a Nepalese politician from the Nepal Family Party, who has been elected to the parliament three times. He is the founder of his party and has served in the government of Nepal as the Minister for the Ministry of Peace and Reconstruction and as the first Minister for Ministry of Co-operatives and Poverty Alleviation. Dhakal is also involved in various international peace-related organizations, holding roles such as the Asia Pacific Regional Chair of the IAPP and Secretary General of the ISC.
short_description: Nepalese politician, founder of the Nepal Family Party, and a former Minister for Peace and Reconstruction and Minister for Co-operatives and Poverty Alleviation.
